document_data.name: Faerie Sword
document_data.mainbody: '''''Faerie sword''''' was an [[elven]] [[wizard]] [[spell]] from the school of [[evocation]].
document_data.Effects:
This spell created a shimmering sword for the caster to use. The magic of the sword made it easier for the caster to strike their foes. Additionally, the caster could choose for their enemy to experience a random effect instead of physical harm if struck by the sword. Examples of these random effects are listed below:
* Instant death,
* Target ''[[teleport]]ed'' away,
* Target imprisoned in a ''[[forcecage]]'',
* Target suffered greater harm,
* Target petrified, or
* Target randomly ''[[polymorph]]ed''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]] a small [[gold]] or crystal sword to cast. The small sword was consumed during the casting.
